event.title: In between 2019 and 2024
event.description:
In between 2019 and 2024, the global digital signage market is expected to grow by 7. 3%, via $20. 8 billion to be able to $29. 6 billion.

But to truly grow into success this growing market, businesses really need to adapt and grow. A single strategy? Become a trusted partner and one-stop search for all video display wants.

Few small and mid-size indication companies and AV integrators offer both outdoor and inside installations. By becoming a specialist in both, companies might penetrate new sales parts, develop stronger relationships together with customers, and deliver a lot more value.

Below, we explore a few of the differences between indoor as opposed to. outdoor LED and considerations when looking to expand your offering. For a more in-depth report for this topic, download our guideline to indoor vs. backyard LED displays.
In this AV integration sector, LCD technology remains to be the industry standard regarding indoor. LCD became the actual go-to technology for AV integrators, because of its ultra-high resolution, yet what you gain inside image quality, you’re prone to lose in brightness levels.

That’s why LED has become more common for interior use. Unlike LCD, LED bulbs are top and center – giving LED a huge advantage in visibility and defining it as the preferable choice.

Here’s the good news: For experienced integrators, learning the latest display technology isn’t detonate science.

“When all has been said and done, there’s a rough equivalency in between an LED display along with a TV monitor, ” claimed Steve Sluder Sr.,Prismview’s Process Integration Manager. “So it’s generally not just a big hurdle to cross. ”.
